ygData.subject: Re: The Man (?) Behind the Curtain
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Ah, I m still looking for a serious job up here since I transplanted myself - they got room for any more bards at WotC?? =) I live pretty close to Renton.
ygData.messageBody:
>From: Beth Moursund <scrybsprite@...>
>Reply-To: eqbards@onelist.com
>To: "'eqbards@onelist.com'" <eqbards@onelist.com>
>Subject: Re: [eqbards] The Man (?) Behind the Curtain

>
>
>No, when I'm not telecommuting I work at the Wizards corporate
>headquarters, down in Renton.
>
> - Windsong Wanderer, bard on Solusek Ro
>

Ah, I'm still looking for a serious job up here since I transplanted myself
- they got room for any more bards at WotC?? =)
I live pretty close to Renton.

Sartori of Kelethin, former wanna-be Loremaster
